text:
Startup working on Community Software | Node/React Full Stack Developer | Brisbane, Australia | Full-Time | On-site

We're a small team working on a platform to connect communities and members, while providing a more automated approach to the icky managerial stuff.

If you're keen to be part of our team and build some cool stuff with the latest tech stacks, shoot us an email. We're not crazy about resume's, just a nice Github link would be cool.

Apply via: will@openclub.co

Apply online: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/309724135/
